Quarter: The specific fiscal quarter and year for which the recruitment data is reported. Format: 'Q[n] YYYY'
New Hires: The number of new employees hired during the specified quarter.
Recruitment Cost: The total cost incurred for recruitment in the specified quarter, including all related expenses.
Cost Per Hire: The average recruitment cost for each new hire in the specified quarter.
Employee Count: The total number of employees in the company at the end of the specified quarter.
